GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object containing information on the article

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Retrieve comments for a specific article with pagination support

comments.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists. Got to find out what kind of sheets these are; not cotton, not rayon, silky.
comments.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a comment to a certain article

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: patches votes to a certain article

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: patches votes on a specific comment

comment.body: Officia nihil harum saepe occaecati dolores inventore. Eos cum illo aut blanditiis eum.
comment.author: weegembump
